### getTLIFunction() {#a071c6530f4d3362b846fdc1701c216e9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Function &#42; getTLIFunction (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &#42; M, <a href="/docs/api/classes/functiontype">FunctionType</a> &#42; VectorFTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> TLIName, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42; ScalarFunc=nullptr)</>}>
Returns a vector <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> that it adds to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> <code>M</code>.

When an <code>ScalarFunc</code> is not null, it copies its attributes to the newly created <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a>.

<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Exit when it is supposed to be a vector argument but it isn&#39;t.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to reconstruct the name for the scalar version of the instruction,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// using scalar argument types.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::string ScalarName =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic/#ab2d91e185087b0ac1f22ef439a170c7f">Intrinsic::isOverloaded</a>(IID)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">          ? <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic/#a7157f9fa9dd11f234ec3c58517cb6d96">Intrinsic::getName</a>(IID, OloadTys, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>-&gt;getModule())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">          : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic/#a7157f9fa9dd11f234ec3c58517cb6d96">Intrinsic::getName</a>(IID).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a223dd14e7d12bc5cea01889b972a98b2">str</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to find the mapping for the scalar version of this intrinsic and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// exact vector width of the call operands in the TargetLibraryInfo. First,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// check with a non-masked variant, and if that fails try with a masked one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vecdesc">VecDesc</a> &#42;VD =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TLI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetlibraryinfo/#acf95582fbff31ea4c597858e1112a6e8">getVectorMappingInfo</a>(ScalarName, EC, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Masked&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!VD &amp;&amp; !(VD = TLI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetlibraryinfo/#acf95582fbff31ea4c597858e1112a6e8">getVectorMappingInfo</a>(ScalarName, EC, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Masked&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/genericcycleimpl-h/#ad78e062f62e0d6e453941fb4ca843e4d">DEBUG&#95;TYPE</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;: Found TLI mapping from: &#96;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; ScalarName</span></CodeLine>
